cakes.name: Let It Drip
cakes.description: Quadruple chocolate cake just drip drip dripping in flavor!
reviews: Is this a real cake, or is this just fantasy?
I've always hated cakes with no flavor, so this is absolutely delightful.
Best cake ever!! I love you!!!

cakes.name: My Cake is Poppin, My Cake is Cool
cakes.description: My Cake is Poppin, My Cake is Cool is elegant, refined, assured, tasty... This cake shows that fruit cakes do have some soul, and is a fruity riot of blackberries, pears, and plums. Reminds me of the bramble, apple and ginger jam my grandmother used to make.

cakes.name: Uh Oh! Which Way's Up?
cakes.description: Upside down, or right side up??
reviews: I lost my pet squirrel to this cake

cakes.name: Strawberry Fields 4ever
reviews: I like to eat this while watching TV
A cake like no other, best served hot

cakes.name: Oreo Overload
reviews: Woe is me, how I long for the days of yore
Reminds me of that time I wasted all of my time

cakes.name: Gingerbread Cakes are Better than All
cakes.description: Running the knife-edge between a house and a home... this particular style is one we truly love. Gingerbread cakes are a great showcase for the skill of our baking team, balancing so many complex and twisting flavours in the same moment.

cakes.name: Chocolate Sparkler
cakes.description: A deliciously robust, black malted cake with a decadent dark, dry cocoa flavour that provides an enticing backdrop to the other parts of the cake.
reviews: Like autumn leaves readying themselves for the winter sun
Beep beep, you're having a cake
